arcane.label: Arcane
arcane.desc: Arcane magic is the purest form of magic, concerned with the control of raw magical energy itself as well as mastering the elements of fire and ice. Wizards are the only class that gain access to arcane magic.

spells.label: Shielding
spells.desc: Choose a friendly target within 10m to receive +1 spell armour. Adds an additional +1 for each additional rank above 1

spells.label: Blink
spells.desc: Immediately move to any spot within range of your movement and line of sight. Can be used while Snared but not Rooted. Adds 1 point of movement range for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Telekinesis
spells.desc: The caster can lift, with the power of their mind, a creature or object under 200KG. Enemy creatures must make an Strength Saving Throw or be lifted and slammed into the ground taking 1d4+INT Blunt damage and become Knocked down. On save success they take half damage and are not knocked down. Does an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Summon Light
spells.desc: Summon a magical light which follows the caster for up to 1 hour. Can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

spells.label: Fire Bolt
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m. On hit they take 1d8+INT Fire damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Arcane Missiles
spells.desc: Fire a number of missiles equal to your Intelligence, each missile hitting random nearby enemies for 1d4 Arcane damage. Does an additional 1 damage per missile for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Burning Hands
spells.desc: Spray fire in a cone area in front of you with a range of 3m. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d6+INT Fire damage. On save success they take half damage. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Open Lock
spells.desc: Choose a target that is locked. If that target is locked by mundane means, it is immediately unlocked. If the target is locked by magical means, the lock spell is suppressed for 1 minute.

spells.label: Swap
spells.desc: The caster swaps places with another friendly character within 10m.

spells.label: Eye of Zomm
spells.desc: Summon a floating eye which the caster can 'see' through and control. Useful for scouting, however the eye is visible to others.

spells.label: Magic Sword
spells.desc: Summon a sword made of pure arcane energy that only you can wield for 1 minute. It has a +1 modifier to Attack and does 2d4+INT+1 Arcane damage.

spells.label: Summon Imp
spells.desc: Call forth a small imp who has 3d6 + caster level health, 0 armour, 1 magic reduction, 15 dodge, 1d20+4 attack with a range of 5m and does 1d6+3 fire damage. The imp has an additional 1d6 health and 1 damage for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Detect Magic
spells.desc: The caster becomes generally aware of any magic effects within 10m.

spells.label: Frost Nova
spells.desc: All creatures within 2m of you must make an Constitution Saving Throw, if they fail they take 3d6+INT ice damage and are Rooted. On save success they take half damage and are not rooted.

spells.label: Ice Bolt
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m. On hit they take 3d8+INT Ice damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Fireball
spells.desc: Choose an area 3mx3m within 10m. All characters within the area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 2d8+INT Fire damage. On success they take half damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Invisibility
spells.desc: Your target magically vanishes from sight for 1 hour. Only creatures with 'see invisible' will be able to see them. Performing any aggressive action will remove the invisibility. For each rank above 2, this can affect 1 additional target.

spells.label: Flame Shield
spells.desc: Engulf an ally in protective flames for 1 minute. Any characters hitting that target in melee combat take 3d4+INT Fire damage. Does an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 3

spells.label: Cancel Magic
spells.desc: Remove a single magical effect on a target within 10m (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies). May affects an additional magical effect for each rank above 3.

spells.label: Dimensional Door
spells.desc: The caster creates a dimensional hole for 1 minute at their current location and another location within 100m that they can either see or visualise. The hole allows anyone to travel through and can be dismissed by the caster at any time.

spells.label: Summon Elemental
spells.desc: Summon an elemental of your choice (fire or ice), the elemental has 5d8+10 health, 6 speed, 20 dodge and does 2d8+INT damage (of the elemental type). The Fire elemental has a permanent rank 3 Flame Shield. The Ice version can cast a rank 3 Icy Grasp once with the same DC as the caster.

spells.label: Icy Spear
spells.desc: Summon a spear made of pure ice that only you can wield for 1 minute. It has a range of 2, +2 modifier to Attack and does 2d4+INT+2 ice damage.

spells.label: Summon Feast
spells.desc: Conjure a great selection of food for up to 10 people. Anyone who consumes the food during a Short or Long Rest gains +2 to all saving throws and immunity to Fear for 12 hours.

spells.label: Identify
spells.desc: The caster learns the magical properties of a chosen magic item they are touching.

spells.label: Choking Cloud
spells.desc: Create a cloud of choking gas at a target location of size 3mx3m, giving all creatures within -1 to attack and suffering 1d4 damage when starting their turn within the cloud.

spells.label: Icy Grasp
spells.desc: Touch a creature within melee range, that creature must make a Strength Saving Throw or take 3d6+INT Ice damage and be encased in ice, Stunned. On save success they take half damage and are not stunned. They must make a Strength Saving Throw at the start of their turn to see if they break free. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 3.

spells.label: Mirror Image
spells.desc: Create a number of identical copies of yourself equal to your Intelligence, confusing enemy creatures. Each enemy attacking you must roll 1d20, on 10 or below their attack will target a mirror image. Images die after taking any damage.

spells.label: Scry
spells.desc: Using a Scrying Gem, you can focus on a creature or location you are familiar with and be presented with a present vision of that target. If the target is a creature, it must make a Spirit Saving Throw to see whether it resists the scry.

spells.label: Teleport
spells.desc: Instantly transports the caster to a chosen previously visited location in the world.

spells.label: Levitate
spells.desc: The caster levitates up to 1m off the ground and can move around freely for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Flaming Sword
spells.desc: The caster imbues a weapon within 10m with flames, adding 1d4+INT Fire damage to that weapon for 1 minute.

spells.label: See Invisible
spells.desc: Your target is able to see invisible creatures for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Blizzard
spells.desc: Choose a target area of size 3m x 3m within 10m, summoning a storm. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 5d8+INT Ice damage. On save success it does half damage. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 4.

spells.label: Chain Lightning
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a creature within 10m. On hit the creature takes 3d8+INT Energy damage. The lightning then bounces to up to 3 other enemy targets, making a Spell Attack on each and doing 2d8 Energy damage. If one of the attacks misses then the chain ends. Each hit does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 4.

spells.label: Blur
spells.desc: Choose a target friendly character, that character becomes a blurred image for 1 minute, causing all attacking characters to roll with disadvantage when attacking that character.

spells.label: Crystalize
spells.desc: Coat yourself in hard crystal for 1 minute, gaining 4d6 temporary health. While you have this temporary health you are Snared.

spells.label: Open Portal
spells.desc: You can transport yourself up to 9 other characters you are touching to any previously visited location.

spells.label: Open Rift
spells.desc: You can open a rift when at a rift tear location. The rift lasts for up to 1 hour and can be dismissed at any time by you.

spells.label: Arcane Greatsword
spells.desc: The caster summons a huge sword made of pure arcane energy that only they can wield for 1 minute. It has a range of 2, +5 modifier to attack and does 1d8+INT+5 Arcane damage.

spells.label: Disintegrate
spells.desc: Create a beam of devastating energy originating at the caster and 10m in length. Each character in the line must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 3d8+INT Arcane damage and 3d8+INT Fire damage. On save success the damage is halved.

spells.label: Call Meteor
spells.desc: Calls down a burning meteor from the sky on a target area 3mx3m. Any characters within the area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take take 5d6+INT Fire damage and 5d6+INT Blunt damage. On save success the damage is halved.

dark.label: Dark
dark.desc: The powers of death and reanimation, available to necromancers and reavers.

light.label: Light
light.desc: The holy power of Marr, available to clerics and paladins.

spells.label: Protection
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target +1 armour against any attacks for 1 minute. Increases by 1 armour for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Heal
spells.desc: Heal a target within 1m for 1d6+SPI health. Increases by 1d6 for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Blessing
spells.desc: The target receives +1 on all checks and attack rolls for 1 minute. Increases by +1 for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Cure Poison
spells.desc: Purge a single poison from the target character. May purge an additional poison for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Weaken Evil
spells.desc: All undead or demons within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw, on failure they are weakened, forcing their next attack roll to be made with Disadvantage

spells.label: Holy Bolt
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack vs a target within 10m, on hit deals 1d6+SPI damage. Deals an additional 1d6 damage against undead or demons. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Symbol
spells.desc: Mark a friendly target within 10m with a holy symbol, granting them 1d6+SPI temporary health. Increases by 1 for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Focus
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m focus for 1 hour, they now roll with Advantage on any Saving Throws.

spells.label: Calm
spells.desc: Calm a target, removing any Fear and granting you Advantage on any Persuasion checks against that character. Unwilling targets must make a Charisma Saving Throw to attempt to resist the affect.

spells.label: Cure Disease
spells.desc: Purge a single disease from the target character. May purge an additional disease for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Flash Heal
spells.desc: Use a Bonus Action to heal the target for 1d4+SPI health. Increases by 1d4 for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Turn Undead
spells.desc: A target undead within 10m must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On save failure deals 2d8+SPI Light damage and the target is Stunned. On success it just deals half damage and no stun. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Beam of Light
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target and any targets in that line, on hit deals 2d8+SPI Light damage to each target in the line. Does an additional 1d8 damage from each rank above 2.

spells.label: Resistance
spells.desc: Pick one type of damage (physical, arcane, fire, cold, mind, light, dark or poison). That character now has Resistance to that type of damage for 1 minute.

spells.label: Revive
spells.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 minute. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms (making additional checks to lower the DC). Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Cancel Magic
spells.desc: Remove a single magical effect on a target within 10m (works for both beneficial effects on enemies, and negative effects on allies). May affects an additional magical effect for each rank above 3.

spells.label: Circle of Healing
spells.desc: All friendly characters within 2m are healed for 1d8+SPI health. Increases by 1d8 for each rank above 3.

spells.label: Bountiful Light
spells.desc: All allies within 5m are blessed with light for 1 hour. Any heals on them now heal for the full die amount and do not need to be rolled.

spells.label: Scry
spells.desc: Using a Scrying Gem, you can focus on a creature or location you are familiar with and be presented with a present vision of that target. If the target is a creature, it must make a Spirit Saving Throw to see whether it resists the scry.

spells.label: Holy Word
spells.desc: All enemies within earshot must make a Spirit Saving Throw. On a failed save they take 4d8+SPI Light damage. Deals an additional 1d8 to undead or demons.

spells.label: Spirit Guardians
spells.desc: Summon 3 protective spirits around yourself which each add 1 to your dodge. When you take damage 1 spirit is removed.

spells.label: Flash of Light
spells.desc: All enemies that can see you are blinded by a flash of light, they must make a Constitution Saving Throw or be Blinded.

spells.label: True Resurrection
spells.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 year. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms. Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Angel's Fury
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target enemy within 10m, deals 5d8+SPI light damage. Does an additional 2d8 damage to demons and undead.

spells.label: Vengeance
spells.desc: Grant divine protection to a target, the next fatal damage they would take is ignored and they can immediately make an attack against the attacking enemy.

nature.label: Nature
nature.desc: The power of the nature and weather.

spells.label: Strength of the Bear
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target additional Strength equal to your Spirit for their next check or attack.

spells.label: Camouflage
spells.desc: The caster blends into the wilderness, becoming invisible for 1 hour. Only works outdoors. Making any aggressive action removes it.

spells.label: Thorny Vines
spells.desc: Choose an enemy within 10m, that creature must make a Strength Saving Throw or be wrapped with small roots causing 1d4+SPI Blunt damage and Rooting them. On save success they take damage but are not rooted. On fail they must attempt the saving throw at the start of each turn to see if they break free or take further damage and remain rooted. Does an additional 1d4 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Call Lightning
spells.desc: Make a Spell Attack on a target within 10m, on hit the target suffers 1d6+SPI Energy damage and is Stunned. Does an additional 1d6 damage for each rank above 1.

spells.label: Healing Wind
spells.desc: Heal a target within 1m for 1d6+SPI health. Increases by 1d6 for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Barkskin
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target within 10m +1 armour and +1 magic reduction for 1 minute. Grants an additional +1 for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Eyes of the Hawk
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target Spirit attack on their next turn.

spells.label: Call Animal
spells.desc: Summon a temporary animal companion for 1 hour (Hawk, Wolf, Panther, Bear).

spells.label: Call Hurricane
spells.desc: Choose a target area 3m x 3m within range. All creatures in that range must make a Constitution Saving Throw or take 2d8+SPI Blunt damage and be knocked down. On save success they take half damage and are not knocked down. Does an additional 1d8 damage for each rank above 2.

spells.label: Spider Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small spider for 1 hour. While in spider form the caster is considered basically invisible.

spells.label: Speed of the Cheetah
spells.desc: Grant a friendly target Agility equal to your Spirit for 1 minute.

spells.label: Summon Wind
spells.desc: Call on the winds to help you levitate off the ground for up to 1 hour.

spells.label: Charm Animal
spells.desc: Choose an animal within range to make a Charisma Saving Throw or be Charmed. The creature rolls with Advantage if it is in combat.

spells.label: Bird Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a small bird for 1 hour. While in bird form the caster can fly.

spells.label: Scry
spells.desc: Using a Scrying Gem, you can focus on a creature or location you are familiar with and be presented with a present vision of that target. If the target is a creature, it must make a Spirit Saving Throw to see whether it resists the scry.

spells.label: Treestride
spells.desc: Instantly transports the caster and up to 9 other people from one tree to another tree that the caster is aware of.

spells.label: Revive
spells.desc: Choose a character to resurrect who has been dead for less than 1 minute. Make a Spirit Saving Throw vs a DC of 10 plus the target characters level. The DC increases by 1 for each time the character has been previously resurrected (including failed attempts). Other characters may assist in various forms (making additional checks to lower the DC). Casting this spell exhausts all the casters spell slots and leaves them exhausted.

spells.label: Poison Cloud
spells.desc: Summon a cloud of poison at a target area of size 3m x 3m. All characters in the area must make a Constitution Saving Throw now and at the start of their turn or take 2d8+SPI Poison damage.

spells.label: Wolf Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a large wolf for 1 hour. While in wolf form the caster gains a +3 to Strength and Agility, has Haste, and rolls 1d8+STR for melee attack damage.

spells.label: Ankh of Reversal
spells.desc: Mark the friendly target, the next fatal damage they would take actually heals them for that amount instead.

spells.label: Tree Form
spells.desc: Take the form of a large tree for 1 hour. While in tree form the caster cannot move, but can still cast spells and gains Resistance to all damage types.

spells.label: Thunderstorm
spells.desc: Choose an area 3m x 3m within range to create a storm that you can maintain with Concentration for up to 1 minute. All creatures within that area must make an Agility Saving Throw or take 5d8+SPI Energy damage. On save success they take half damage.

mind.label: Mind
mind.desc: The power to alter the mind, available to Enchanters.

spells.label: Enhance Mind
spells.desc: Grant your target enhanced Intelligence for 1 hour. That character has Advantage on all Intelligence Checks for the duration.

spells.label: Wrack Mind
spells.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make an Intelligence Saving Throw or take 1d6+CHA Mind damage

spells.label: Mirage
spells.desc: Surround a friendly target in a mirage for 1 minute. All creatures attacking must make an Intelligence Saving Throw or their attack will have Disadvantage.

spells.label: Lovesick
spells.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make a Charisma Saving Throw or it will be unable to attack you for 1 minute.

spells.label: Lesser Charm
spells.desc: Choose a creature within 10m, that creature must make a Charisma Saving Throw with Advantage or it will be Charmed until the end of it's next turn.
